name: Eclipse (itch)
description:
This games have been created for the Games Factory Jam, under 60 hours.
For more information visit the game page.

Team
Daftorx : Graphics
HamsterOh : Game Design / Programming
Stim : Game Design / Programming / Level Design / Modelization

Controls
Move view : Mouse
Rotate view : Right Click + Mouse
Select Planet : Left Click
Mouse Scroll : Zoom
Rotate Planet : Use the two button controls or Left/Right arrow

Credits
Textures: Some textures on this game have been created with photographs from Textures.com. These photographs may not be redistributed by default, please visit www.textures.com for more information.
Musics: www.bensound.com
Sounds : www.freesound.org, www.soundsnap.com
